doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Patryk Olejniczak
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Connie and Donnie by Patryk Olejniczak

main.head: Connie and Donnie
main.p: Patryk is a freelance character concept artist and illustrator who lives in Lodz, Poland. He is a self-taught artist who is influenced by music and films. He especially likes drawing and looking at charismatic and interesting characters. He also enjoys modern architecture and digital photography.
